PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04732018-05-01,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of BERND STEPHEN CHRISTMAS of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
